governor.translation[0].definitions[0].d: the person in charge of governing a state in the US
governor.translation[0].definitions[1].d: the person in charge of governing a country that is under the political control of another country
governor.translation[0].definitions[2].d: a member of a committee that controls an organization or institution
governor.translation[0].definitions[3].d: the person in charge of an institution
governor.translation[0].definitions[3].e: the governor of the central bank
governor.translation[1].definitions[0].d: the person in charge of an important organization such as a country’s CENTRAL BANK
governor.translation[1].definitions[0].e: the governor of the Bank of England
governor.translation[1].definitions[1].d: a member of the committee in control of an institution such as a school, or of some official organizations
governor.translation[1].definitions[1].e: The BBC’s board of governors meets today to discuss the whole issue of funding.
